plot: An outdoor adventure park is terrorized by a hungry saber-tooth tiger. Cutter and his team try to track down the beast but Valerie, a skeptical staff member stands in their way.

Connor has tested his anomaly-detector, but it seems to have failed to detect one near an amusement park when a guest if killed by a creature that appears to be a giant cat. Thinking a local man who used to import lions for sale is behind the attack, the team assembles in case it is something else. When the manager of the park is killed in sight of a trainspotter (with a camera), it's clear a sabertooth tiger is roaming about, but it also appears that someone is hiding it during the day.—Ron Kerrigan <mvg@whidbey.com>
